98497.なんと ダイラは\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>を 耳かきとして 使った！:
To my surprise, Daira used
<%sEV_QUE_NAME4> as an ear bud!

97301.<pipipi_off>美しいマデ島の写真が 飾られている。\n写真には マザー:
A beautiful copy of Made Isle is on display. The copy also shows the abbey where Lyriol met Mother Lione, who
changed her name to Lyriol.

99602.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「誰かからの手紙:
Isn't it exciting to receive a letter from someone? I think it is because we are on such a small island that we get
so much joy when we receive a letter.

87292.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「手紙を書く時っ:
When I write a letter, I think about the person I'm writing to, and as I rewrite it over and over again, I
sometimes realize new feelings. Sometimes I feel embarrassed when I read them back the next morning, but I
find it best to talk in a letter because words don't come out as quickly as they do in person.
